a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Energy use per person vs. GDP per capita, 2022
Energy refers to primary energy, measured in kilowatt-hours per person, using the substitution method. Gross
domestic product (GDP) is adjusted for inflation and differences in the cost of living between countries.
Data source: U.S. Energy Information Administration (2023) and other sources
Note: GDP data is expressed in international-$ at 2017 prices.
